Plot: A woman who lives in a darkened old house with her two photosensitive children becomes convinced that her family home is haunted.
Title: The Others
Actors: Nicole Kidman, Fionnula Flanagan, Christopher Eccleston, Alakina Mann
tomatoConsensus: The Others is a spooky thriller that reminds us that a movie doesn't need expensive special effects to be creepy.
Awards: Nominated for 1 Golden Globe. Another 28 wins & 50 nominations.
